channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Governance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Governance

item.title: CVE-2022-22453|2024-09-16T17:57:49.743Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 224919.

item.title: CVE-2023-35018|2024-09-16T19:15:18.958Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 could allow a privileged use to upload arbitrary files due to improper file validation. IBM X-Force ID: 259382.

item.title: CVE-2023-33836|2024-09-16T19:14:46.287Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 256016.

item.title: CVE-2022-22460|2024-09-16T20:33:02.904Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 contains sensitive information in the source code repository that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 225013.

item.title: CVE-2022-22455|2024-09-16T20:06:52.733Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance Identity Manager 10.0 virtual appliance component performs an operation at a privilege level that is higher than the minimum level required, which creates new weaknesses or amplifies the consequences of other weaknesses. IBM X-Force ID: 224989.

item.title: CVE-2023-35013|2024-09-16T19:17:48.777Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Governance 10.0, Identity Manager could allow a local privileged user to obtain sensitive information from source code. IBM X-Force ID: 257769.
